subject: p11474065
Findings: The previously seen chest tube has been removed without evidence of pneumothorax. The right loculated pleural effusion remains. The right hemithorax appears less opacified due to improved position of the patient, but mild residual diffuse opacification remains. The cardiac silhouette remains enlarged.
Impression: No pneumothorax after chest tube removal.
